Name: Dark Metamorphosis
Desc:
Unlocks your potential for a certain period of time, increasing damage and generating 2 dark weapons that rapidly spin around you and automatically attack multiple enemies within range.
Dark Metamorphosis does not cause you to take damage even when attacking enemies in the Damage Reflection Status.

Desc.Old: Unlocks your potential for a certain period of time, increasing damage and generating 2 dark weapons that rapidly spin around you and automatically attack multiple enemies within range. Metamorphosis does not affect the enemy's Damage Reflection effect. Canceled upon riding on a mount.
Desc.New:
Unlocks your potential for a certain period of time, increasing damage and generating 2 dark weapons that rapidly spin around you and automatically attack multiple enemies within range.
Dark Metamorphosis does not cause you to take damage even when attacking enemies in the Damage Reflection Status.

H.Old:
HP 300, Force Cost: 40. Invincible while casting the buff. Damage +35% for 180 sec. Automatically attacks nearby enemies at 250% damage.
Cooldown: 90 sec.
[Passive effect: Max HP +20%]
H.New:
HP Cost: 300. Force Cost: 40. Makes you Invincible while it's cast.

Auto-attacks up to 6 enemies at 250% Damage.
Cooldown: 90 sec.
[Passive Effects: Max HP +20%]
